data.text: @JohnTory @ChiefPeggTFS @TOPublicHealth @Torontofire The Order of Ontario https://t.co/CTeIOwnWtl for @ChiefPeggTFS is well deserved! Thank you for your leadership
@JohnTory Under your poor mayorship, #TO face catastrophic deficit and property taxes increased too. Shame on you.
@JohnTory @ChiefPeggTFS @TOPublicHealth @Torontofire Hey Johnny keep raising those property taxes 🤡
@JohnTory @ChiefPeggTFS @TOPublicHealth @Torontofire Yes your clinics killed many experimental tests on Canadian people.  War crmes

@JohnTory @TOPublicHealth @Torontofire Thank you sir. Very much appreciated. It has been my honour to serve in the role of #COVID19 Incident Commander alongside you, @epdevilla, @joe_cressy and our entire Strategic Command and operational teams.
